title: Hydraulic Doors – The Perfect Choice For Modern Spaces

siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: 1. What is a Hydraulic Door? A hydraulic aluminum door ( cua nhom thuy luc ) is a type of tempered glass door that uses a floor hinge with a hydraulic mechanism to control the opening and closing force. When opened, the door will automatically close gently and safely thanks to the oil-controlled mechanism inside the hinge. This is a modern glass door solution that is widely used in houses, offices, showrooms, and shopping centers. 2. Advantages of Hydraulic Doors Automatic gentle closing: Operates quietly, avoids strong impacts. Elegant design: Transparent glass creates a spacious, open, and classy feel. High durability: Tempered glass is strong and impact-resistant; the imported floor hinge works stably over time. Safe and convenient: Suitable for high-traffic areas. Flexible installation: Easily integrates into various architectural styles. 3. Structure of a Hydraulic Door A standard hydraulic door set includes: 10–12mm tempered glass Hydraulic floor hinge Glass clamps (top, bottom, corner) Inox or aluminum handle Floor lock or electronic lock (optional) Hydraulic aluminum doors are available in brown color and other tones upon request. 4. Popular Types of Hydraulic Doors Single-leaf hydraulic door: Compact and convenient for narrow entrances. Double-leaf hydraulic door: Commonly used for storefronts and offices. Framed or frameless hydraulic doors: Choose based on interior design preferences. 5. Applications of Hydraulic Doors Office spaces Shops, cafés, showrooms Residential homes: main entrance, connecting rooms, balconies Commercial centers, hotel lobbies 6. Price of Hydraulic Doors The cost of hydraulic doors typically ranges from 1,300,000 VND to 2,500,000 VND/m², depending on the glass thickness, type of hinge, and accessories used. For an accurate quote, you should contact a reputable installation company for a free consultation and site assessment. 7. Installation Notes Choose glass that meets safety standards (with quality certification) Ensure the hinge matches the size and weight of the door Install correctly to ensure durability and stability Perform regular maintenance on hinges and accessories Conclusion: If you're looking for a modern, durable, and convenient glass door solution, hydraulic doors are the perfect choice. They not only elevate the living or working space but also optimize functionality and express refined aesthetic taste. html:
1. 1. What is a Hydraulic Door?
    A hydraulic aluminum door ( cua nhom thuy luc ) is a type of tempered glass door that uses a floor hinge with a hydraulic mechanism to control the opening and closing force. When opened, the door will automatically close gently and safely thanks to the oil-controlled mechanism inside the hinge. This is a modern glass door solution that is widely used in houses, offices, showrooms, and shopping centers.

    2. Advantages of Hydraulic Doors

    • Automatic gentle closing: Operates quietly, avoids strong impacts.
    • Elegant design: Transparent glass creates a spacious, open, and classy feel.
    • High durability: Tempered glass is strong and impact-resistant; the imported floor hinge works stably over time.
    • Safe and convenient: Suitable for high-traffic areas.
    • Flexible installation: Easily integrates into various architectural styles.

    3. Structure of a Hydraulic Door
    A standard hydraulic door set includes:
    • 10–12mm tempered glass
    • Hydraulic floor hinge
    • Glass clamps (top, bottom, corner)
    • Inox or aluminum handle
    • Floor lock or electronic lock (optional)
    Hydraulic aluminum doors are available in brown color and other tones upon request.

    4. Popular Types of Hydraulic Doors

    • Single-leaf hydraulic door: Compact and convenient for narrow entrances.
    • Double-leaf hydraulic door: Commonly used for storefronts and offices.
    • Framed or frameless hydraulic doors: Choose based on interior design preferences.
    5. Applications of Hydraulic Doors
    • Office spaces
    • Shops, cafés, showrooms
    • Residential homes: main entrance, connecting rooms, balconies
    • Commercial centers, hotel lobbies
    6. Price of Hydraulic Doors
    The cost of hydraulic doors typically ranges from 1,300,000 VND to 2,500,000 VND/m², depending on the glass thickness, type of hinge, and accessories used. For an accurate quote, you should contact a reputable installation company for a free consultation and site assessment.

    7. Installation Notes

    • Choose glass that meets safety standards (with quality certification)
    • Ensure the hinge matches the size and weight of the door
    • Install correctly to ensure durability and stability
    • Perform regular maintenance on hinges and accessories
    Conclusion: If you're looking for a modern, durable, and convenient glass door solution, hydraulic doors are the perfect choice. They not only elevate the living or working space but also optimize functionality and express refined aesthetic taste.
